nodes.text: The Dennig-Far, or "False Hope" in Galactic Basic Standard, was an Oktarian term that the people of Oktaro used to describe the three years between the liberation of their planet from the Separatist Alliance and the arrival of the Galactic Empire. It came to be because, once the Separatists were gone, the Oktarians thought they could rebuild their civilization for a brighter future, but their efforts were ultimately in vain because of the Imperial occupation.
